body:
Hello!


I know that radiance do interpolate data files linearly. 


Is it possible to let it interpolete them in other ways?


Same about light distribution data files.. beeing in the end data files, I assume they are linerly interpolated as well, are they? Is it possible to change their interpolation as well ?


Lucio


.. Caminante no hay camino, solo se hace camino al andar ..
